thread.title_full: GOL decreased domestic supply by 0.6% in August 2015Travelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: GOL decreased domestic supply by 0.6% in August 2015Travelandtourworld.com
text:
GOL decreased domestic supply by 0.6% in August 2015
GOL Linhas Aereas Inteligentes S.A. , the largest low-cost and best-fare airline in Latin America, hereby announces its preliminary air traffic figures for August and year to date . Comparisons refer to the same period in 2014.
GOL Highlights
GOL decreased domestic supply in August by 0.6%, in line with its forecast fall of between 2 and 4% in the second half, equivalent to a fall by up to 1% in 2015.Domestic demand reduced by 2.8% in the month, leading to a load factor of 76.1%, a drop of 1.7 p.p. compared to August 2014. Year to date, the increase is 4.7%, 2.0 p.p. higher over the same period in 2014, totaling 79.0% in 2015.
The international market capacity increased by 2.2% and demand showed an improvement of 3.5% in the month, registering a load factor of 72.9%, up 1.0 p.p. compared to August 2014.
We recorded a total of 3.1 million passengers transported in the month, a decrease of 7.5% compared to August 2014. Year to date, we transported 26.3 million passengers, 1.7% higher if compared to the same period 2014.
The average applied fares in August were higher than those in the second quarter of 2015.
Source:- Voegol
